text: Super experienced Mr Siah who was able to open vintage safe that was left by grands and lost the key due to moving of house.
Helpful and good service bought a new safe from Mr Siah.
Bought a Chubb safe from them in oct 2019, the team is well equipped and professional. My flooring were protected throughout and safe is of the high security and quality! Recommended!

Enquiries for the shifting of safe turn around time is pretty responsive and address to most of the concerns raised. Provided comprehensive safe and efficient method for shifting of safes, worried-free. Overall services provided are excellent. Recommended services.

Engage them in january 2020, to open my diplomat safe . Safe is locked with no number and key. The team is friendly, fast and professional . Was recommended by my friends who have used their service to move their safe. Open my safe within 5-10mins . Impressive!
